definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Are these indications of a fragment of the Tunguska body?
sentences.chinese: 这些现象是否代表那里埋著通古斯卡撞击天体的碎片？

sentences.english: The meteorite which devastated Tunguska is now estimated to have been about 50 metres across.
sentences.chinese: 据猜测，毁灭通古斯的陨石的直径有近50英里。

sentences.english: We had assumed that the lake-bottom sediments might contain markers of the Tunguska event.
sentences.chinese: 我们假设湖底沉积物可能含有通古斯卡事件的标记。

sentences.english: Soon our time in Tunguska was nearly over.
sentences.chinese: 我们在通古斯卡的旅程很快就结束。

sentences.english: In the Qing Dynasty Xibo was part of Manchu- Tungus culture.
sentences.chinese: 在清代处于满通古斯文化系统。

sentences.english: A comet may have been the cause of the Tunguska event in Russia in 1908.
sentences.chinese: 1908年可能是一颗彗星导致了俄国通古斯事件。

definition: Altai republic in Russian central Asia, capital Gorno-Altaysk
ancient ethnic group of northeast frontier of China
Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia
Daur ethnic group of Inner Mongolia and Heilongjiang
